definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: In October, when the German television station to my interview with wire stunt team.
sentences.chinese: 德國的電視臺來我隊採訪威亞特技。
特技飛行是危險的運動。

sentences.english: Often a stuntman's success depends on careful timing.
sentences.chinese: 通常一個特技人的勝利取決於小心的調速。

sentences.english: The acrobats got warmed up before the circus show.
sentences.chinese: 特技表演家在馬戲團開始前做些練習。

sentences.english: Six contestants, three stunts, one winner.
sentences.chinese: 六名選手，三項特技，唯有一名勝者。

sentences.english: He used to stunt-drive in acrobatic performances.
sentences.chinese: 他過去常在雜技表演中表演驅車特技。

sentences.english: In the world of motorcycle stunt riding, is there anyone that you might idolize?
sentences.chinese: 在摩托車特技表演界，有沒有誰是你的偶像？

sentences.english: Motorcycle stunts performed by the late 'Little Black' Ko Shou Liang.
sentences.chinese: 電單車特技由小黑柯受良演出。

sentences.english: Regenerating units are much less likely to get battle afflictions .
sentences.chinese: 有再生特技的部隊在戰鬥中不會那麼容易積累戰傷。

sentences.english: When it comes to snowboarding, a wheelie is a simple matter of balance.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及到滑雪，一車特技是一個平衡的簡單的事情。
表演一分鐘的特技組合。

sentences.english: The easiest wheelie to do is on the tail of your snowboard.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單的車特技做的是對你的滑雪板尾。

sentences.english: To appear at county fairs and carnivals in exhibitions of stunt flying and parachute jumping.
sentences.chinese: 一個遍遊全國進行特技飛行和空降展覽的飛行員。

sentences.english: She is long-range lethality highest warriors, have penetrate enemy stunts.
sentences.chinese: 她是遠程殺傷裏最高的兵種，擁有穿透敵人的特技。

sentences.english: Jacky Chen always does his own stunts in his film.
sentences.chinese: 成龍在他的電影中向來都是親自表演特技動作。

sentences.english: China's research and special clever stunt performance experts.
sentences.chinese: 中國絕技研究及特技奇技表演專家。

definition: to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
